name: Archery 3D - Be a Bowman in real Bow and Arrow Outdoor Tournament
name_original: Archery 3D - Be a Bowman in real Bow and Arrow Outdoor Tournament
description:
Get ready for the Archery Tournament. An amazing Bow and Arrow game to make you thrill. Be a Robin Hood, test your skills. Become Archery Masters with your shooting skills. Complete each mission to win coins. Upgrade your bows to become perfect bow master.

GAME FEATURES:-

*FREE game to play with in-app purchases.
*Different powerful lethal bows to upgrade & shoot.
*NEW Realistic physics of bow & arrow to feel the 3D environment.
*Amazing game play& HD graphics features.
*Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views.
*Explore different worlds & unlock new missions.


How to Play:-

Drag your finger towards target to release arrow.
